author: La Sale, Antoine de, b. 1388?
Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547, attributed trans.
notes: Woodcut illustration on title page and throughout text.
A translation in verse, possibly by Robert Copland, of: La Sale, Antoine de.  Quinze joyes de mariage.
C4r has catch title at bottom: "xv. Ioyes".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
